pr_title: [eventhubs] Add a note about Roles for AAD Auth

timeline.bodyText:
Just for consistency, use underscore instead of hyphen for links.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [aad-authorization]: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/event-hubs/authorize-access-azure-active-directory
          
          
            
            [aad_authorization]: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/event-hubs/authorize-access-azure-active-directory
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.message:
[eventhubs] Add a note about Roles for AAD Auth

Add a small note to the `README.md` which notes that when using AAD that
you need to assign a specific role to your principal in order to access
Event Hubs.
